name: Tech Demo - ProtoDungeon: Episode I 3D
description:
Just a palette cleanser this January after working on nanowrimo the past two months. Got back into Unity, Crocotile, and Sprytile. Learned a lot, had fun! Unity is way cooler than it was a decade ago.

Colliders are all messed up, torches/jar are weird, and it's not complete (and may never be), but it exists and right now that's enough lol.
